item.title: Nina add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Nina add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Nina add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nina add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Nina add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Nina add a quote by Wayne W. Dyer
item.description: "Present-moment living, getting in touch with your now, is at the heart of effective living. When you think about it, there really is no other moment you can live. Now is all there is, and the future is just another present moment to live when it arrives." -- Wayne W. Dyer

item.title: Nina add a quote by Wayne W. Dyer
item.description: "Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change." -- Wayne W. Dyer

item.title: Nina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nina add a quote by LOUISE L. HAY (FOREWORD) LOUIS PROTO
item.description: "Remember, you have been criticizing yourself for years and it hasnâ€™t worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens." -- LOUISE L. HAY (FOREWORD) LOUIS PROTO

item.title: Nina add a quote by Louise Hay
item.description: "The point of power is always in the present moment." -- Louise Hay

item.title: Nina add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Nina add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Nina add a quote by Lao-Tzu
item.description: "By letting go it all gets done." -- Lao-Tzu

item.title: Nina add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Stop thinking, and end your problems." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Nina add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." -- Lao Tzu
